sentence.Network_en: He was the victim of calumny.
Calumny is answered best with silence.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin calumnia

entry.def: Calumny or a calumny is an untrue statement made about someone in order to reduce other people's respect and admiration for them.

example.ex: He was the victim of calumny.

means.word_mean: 2. an abusive attack on a person's character or good name

auth_sentence.content: A mark to the arrows of lurking calumny.
auth_sentence.res_content: A mark to the arrows of lurking calumny.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A mark to the arrows of lurking calumny.

auth_sentence.content: Which being...within the reach of my own Knowledge, I do averr to be a Calumny.

auth_sentence.content: I am sorry but you can not even provide any coherent rebuttal to the "Mike's Nature Trick" calumny.
